Subject: The Find
Message-ID: <8iomt2+eva2@...>

Vulois is flying over in the mountains. He has only been here for a 
short time, but he has seen the leadership that Hell beast has 
displayed, or lack of.

"It's time for a new leader. And if what I think is up here, than we 
won't just have a new leader, we will have a new breed!"

Vulois flys up into a cave in the mountain and sees a huge pile of 
rocks. He starts uncovering them, when a huge Mountain Goat appears 
from behind him and trys to Ram him. Vulois blasts him before he has 
a chance.

"Dumb sheep...."

He continues to pull away at the Rocks, and he finds what he's 
looking for.

"If I'm right, this ball is a Transmetal 3 Driver! But how did it get 
here?"

Vulois touches it, and it shows him the mystery. It is back in the 
Beast Wars. Megatron is laughing. He has just used his Transmetal 2 
driver to create a new Dino-Bot. But what's this? Someone is leaping 
into the beam. It's Cheetor! He jumps right into it and swats the 
driver away. But he is being filled with all this energy. It is doing 
something to his body. Now he seems to be choking on something. He's
coughing up a Driver! This must be this one. the energy has enhanced 
it, and it's being flung towards this mountain. It hits the wall and 
all the rocks fall on it. The image ends.

Vulois is amazed. This can be the turning point in the battle. But he 
doesn't know how to use it. He needs someone with brains. He sends a 
secret message to all Predacons except Hell Beats.

"To any predacon who is good with electronics and dislikes Hell 
Beast's leadership, come home in on my signal. We have business to 
discust that may change the face of the Neo Beast Wars!"

Vulois sits with the driver and waits for an answer.
